caption: The video starts with a man and two women watching a video, seemingly searching for someone. The scene then shifts to a tall office building. An older man with white hair gets into a Jeep, only to realize that the driver is not his usual one but the man from the earlier scene. The younger man then starts to threaten the older man, seemingly trying to extract some information from him. At one point, he even drags the older man out of the Jeep and holds a gun to his chin as a means of intimidation. Ultimately, the threats appear to work, and the younger man gets what he wants. By the end of the video, the younger man reunites with his wife and child, returning to family life. His friends too seem to have settled back into a more peaceful existence.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, acient, modern, or in the future?
